department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Request for Proposals (RFP) to provide Elder services to Indigenous offenders at Springhill Institution and Nova Institution for Women.
description: Eligible bidders are required to submit a statement of capabilities outlining their knowledge and experience in delivering Elder services, as described in the attached documents. Senior Project Manager, Regional Contracting and Services, Regional Contracting and Services, 506-378-8722.
